name: Caley
greetingText: If you're looking for nicknames, you could try Cal, Lee, or go with me?
wishText: I think we'd have a lot to talk about. Want to grab a coffee and see where it goes? ;)
text1: I know you're really busy right now, so don't worry about me. I'm here whenever you need to talk or just need a break....
textInChatBox: I like you and want to know you better blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you love it.
